notes:
Chat Video Pro V3.0.3 introduces advanced long-form processing, direct documentation integration, and next-gen motion control.

Story Cutter: Now supports 3+ hour transcripts with refined story structure options for documentary and long-form editors.

Video Prompter: Complete UX overhaul for custom prompts with improved output quality and optimized prompter cards.

Brand Voice Assistant: New /music command to find trending audio instantly, plus Website Learning to self-train on your brand's URL.

Knowledge Base: Direct integration with our new official documentation for instant in-panel help and workflow tutorials.

Kling Motion Control: New video-to-video 'Mocap' modelâ€”animate any reference image using the movement and physics of a source video.
